short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to make calls on your extension, send SMS messages, access your company phone book and view recent calls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Surftec Phone allows you to make calls and send SMS messages directly from the Chrome Web Browser.

Click on phone numbers within web pages without needing to manually dial.

Save new contacts to your company wide phone book and search for contacts to call by typing any part of their name or company name to quickly find the contact you need to call.

Surftec Phone for Chrome allows screen popping, inbound calls can be set to open a web-page, for instance search a contact within your cloud accounts or CRM system.

To use Surftec Phone you will require a subscription available at www.surftec.com
